resources.string: Speak Now. Say \"help\" for more information.
Cannot capture voice - ensure Google Voice Search is installed.
Welcome to Voice Note. Simply start the app, and speak your notes.\n\nSay \"settings\" to configure the settings, and \"help\" to see this screen.
Upgrading is compulsory.\nYou will become like us.
Voice Note is a simple open source app to help you capture notes by speaking, and send them to your favorite note-taking app.\n\nSee the source at: https://github.com/TimMackenzie/VoiceNote
Failed to start market intent for Voice Search app
Failed to send message.\nTry a different destination in the settings.
